\\\"Spike & Mike.\\\" Mellow Manor is named after the famed Victorian house in Riverside where Spike, Mike and
many others lived in a communal setting. This was an ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“Animal HouseÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ before National Lampoon made theirs
famous. Although Mike Gribble passed away in August of 1994, Spike continues to produce touring

subversive excellence.
